title: Extremely slow download speeds
body: I have to download a 1700MB patch and it is downloading at a rate of 200kbps or less, averaging 150kbps

replies.body:
Hey Scorpeanna,

If 150kbps is too slow for you, I would recommend trying a VPN, specifically HotSpot Shield. It may work for some people and not work for others, so I wouldn't expect too much from it.
I installed HotSpot Shield but how exactly do I make lol run faster or do I just leave it on?
It not that it is too slow for me but rather this is not the normal download speed of my internet. I did a speedtest on speedtest.net and I got around 30Mbps
